import React , {useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button, Col, FormGroup, FormLabel, FormControl, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
